original_text: So both choirs of those who gave thanks stood in the house of God, and I and half of the officials with me;
korean_text: 이에 감사 찬송하는 두 무리가 하나님의 전에 섰고 또 나와 민장의 절반도 함께 하였고

sentences.original_text: So both choirs of those who gave thanks
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 감사를 드리던 자들의 두 합창대는

sentences.original_text: stood in the house of God
and I and half of the officials with me
